title: Recent developments in synthesis of attapulgite composite materials for refractory organic wastewater treatment: a review
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16300-16317
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02014F, Review Article

Ting Zhang, Xiaoyi Huang, Jiaojiao Qiao, Yang Liu, Jingjing Zhang, Yi Wang
A comprehensive review of preparations, characterization methods and mechanisms of attapulgite-based composite materials, as well as their applications in refractory organic wastewater treatment were provided.
